title: PHPyieldKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about PHPyieldKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content: Example Use yield to create a generator function: "; } ?> Definition and Usage The yield keyword is used to create a generator function. Generator functions act as iterators which can be looped through with a foreach loop. The value given by the yield keyword is used as a value in one of the iterations of the loop. Related Pages The foreach keyword. The yield from keyword. ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPyieldKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPyieldKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples.
